title: MFM Minisode 36
description: This week's minisode comes to you on episode day! Karen and Georgia read your hometown stories including a letter from from a young listener, a surprise lion encounter, a touching ghost story, and the 'laziest' kidnapping attempt ever.
author: exactlyrightmedia@gmail.com (Exactly Right)
